taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a module or fragment based on a dataset opened in the Editor area. The dataset contains at least one attribute based on an enumeration whose underlying type is set to built-in business type AAABusinessTypes:EnumMask .

step.cmd: Select the Checkbox in the Palette menu and drop it into the Editor area.
In the Editor area, click on the checkbox.
In the Properties view pane, set the domain entity to the attribute.

taskbody.result: Many checkboxes are created, one per enumerated value. You can delete, move (into another grid cell or box), or change the translation of each checkbox.
